message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more to account for inflation over time.
I'll take a bit more since you'll lose value over time
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. I'm losing money every round we play. Meet me in the middle.
You're losing value, I'm not. My patience is worth something.
Bob, this is my final offer. It's more than fair considering the inflation working against me. If you refuse, we both lose.
You're running out of time, and I'm not feeling generous
